I name the fiction list "SHQ Spy Division"?  I'm flirting with the 
spy theme because we're telling stories... sometimes stories 
characters probably wouldn't want told.  I think that Yahoogroups 
searches the group description, so having Saitou's name in there 
would still pull it up on a search by his name...

pachi
